alert.note: Alert for DeWitt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 9:13PM CDT until April 15 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central DeWitt County in south central Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 913 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Cuero, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Thomaston around 925 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Arneckville and Meyersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
